meanings.definition: A painting or photograph of the sea.
meanings.sent1: The seascape on the wall reminded me of our beach vacation.
meanings.sent2: She loved to gaze at the seascape hanging in the art gallery.
meanings.sent3: The seascape in the museum made the waves look like they were dancing.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the essence of the sea in his seascape.
meanings.sent5: The colors in the seascape were so vivid, it felt like I was standing on the shore.

meanings.sent1: From the hilltop, we had a breathtaking seascape of the ocean below.
meanings.sent2: The hotel room had a beautiful seascape overlooking the bay.
meanings.sent3: The seascape from the lighthouse made the ships look like tiny toys.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes widened at the vastness of the seascape before her.
meanings.sent5: The seascape at sunset painted the sky with hues of orange and pink.
